label: name
body_text: patients name is saraj sharma with age 25 and date of birth 28th february 1999.

label: symptoms
body_text: symptoms include include dry cough for the last 3 days, no fever and running nose.

label: diagnosis
body_text: he is suffering from acute bronchitis.

label: prescription
body_text: he needs to take azithromycin 500 mg once a day for 3 days and robitussin 5 ml thrice a day for 5 days.

label: advice
body_text: he is advised to drink warm water and he is not allowed to eat grapes.
